import requests, cookiecutter

def request_with_cookies(url, cookies_file='cookies.txt'):
cookies = cookiecutter.load(cookies_file)
response = requests.get(url, cookies=cookies)
return response

cookies_jar = requests.cookies.RequestsCookieJar()
cookies_jar.set('session_id', 'session_value', domain='example.com')

response = request_with_cookies('https://example.com', cookies_file='cookies.txt')
